hero.core_tension: Choose inventory and marketing for a smaller, higher-value late-season window instead of matching early November discounts.
hero.setting: Retail operations war room, three-quarter angle on operator at table; matte paper planograms and metallic SKU mockups on the table; composition cue: subject centered, shallow depth, material contrast between paper and metal.
hero.persona: Head of Retail choosing a collab-led, store-as-studio approach with the CMO visible in the frame.
hero.action: Pinning a reserved inventory block and partnership slot on a focused third-week-of-December calendar; pointing at a test brief labeled "exclusive + event".
hero.urgency_symbol: A calendar page with the third-week highlighted and a visible, uncluttered reservation stamp to signal time-sensitive allocation.
props: Exclusive SKU mockup box tied to the S3 pilot
QR signage mockup linked to the S2 giveaway
Compact partnership term sheet referencing retailer exclusives
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights and clean negative space; warm key on faces, cool fill on plans.
hero.alt: Head of Retail reserves inventory and signs partnership to run a third-week December exclusive test.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings representing calendar blocks (early-Nov ring, mid-Nov ring, third-week-Dec ring) with radial nodes; include embedded numeric anchors showing footfall uplift targets and QR redemption floors within the geometry.
elements: Tokens for exclusives (small discs) placed on the third-week ring
Arcs showing shopper flow from early-Nov rings into the third-week ring
Pins for events and SKU drops with micro-labels showing % uplift and QR floor
signal_map.motion: Directional flow from multiple early-window nodes converging into a concentrated third-week node; arrows of increasing density indicate planned traffic consolidation and measurement spine.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals with a pop of retail blue and metallic accent on exclusive tokens; materials suggest paper, brushed metal, and acrylic for pins.
signal_map.alt: CMO studying a ring map plotting footfall uplift and QR redemption across weeks to plan exclusives.

case_studies.scene: Small-format store counter during Nov 28 giveaway; three-quarter angle focused on register area and queue; materials: laminated QR cards, tempered glass counter.
case_studies.moment: A staff member scans a QR redemption on a tablet while a tablet graph shows a visible uptick in conversion versus baseline; symbolic tension shown by a half-full tally board marking margin versus volume.
case_studies.persona: Head of Retail with CMO running the S2 in-store exclusive giveaway.
props: Laminated QR cards for the giveaway
Tablet displaying redemption and conversion delta
Tally board comparing baseline conversion and giveaway conversion
case_studies.lighting: Directed editorial spotlight on the QR scan, soft ambient in background to isolate the action.
case_studies.alt: Head of Retail and CMO run Nov 28 in-store giveaway, measuring QR redemptions and conversion uplift.

case_studies.scene: Back-of-store staging area where retailer-exclusive SKU pallets are unboxed; low-angle close crop on a planogram hand and an exclusive SKU label; composition cue: low-angle to emphasize shelf presence; material: corrugated cardboard and matte-finished product.
case_studies.moment: A retailer rep pins an exclusive SKU tag and a small sales tracker shows early footfall lift; the visual tension is the reserved inventory ledger partially filled, implying scarce supply.
case_studies.persona: Head of Brand Partnerships executing the S3 pilot of two retailer-exclusive SKUs for Dec 15–21.
props: Compact sales tracker chart showing week-on-week footfall
case_studies.lighting: Crisp studio light on product surfaces, cool fill for background to foreground exclusives.
case_studies.alt: Head of Brand Partnerships launches retailer-exclusive SKU pilot Dec 15–21 to lift footfall and partner value.

case_studies.scene: Store pop-up staged as a small media set during Dec 18–20; three-quarter angle that includes host, camera, and shoppers; material cues: polished riser, soft fabric backdrops.
case_studies.moment: A shopper checks in via QR to enter a media-day experience while a producer notes event CPA on a tablet; symbolic timing shown by a scoreboard tracking CPA versus baseline target.
case_studies.persona: Head of Retail running S5 pop-up media days to measure event CPA and capture owned content.
props: Compact camera and mic boom suggesting content capture
Signage reading "Media Day" with small metrics card showing CPA target
case_studies.lighting: Editorial backlight with crisp key highlight on the check-in QR action to create focus and shareable stills.
case_studies.alt: Head of Retail runs pop-up media days Dec 18–20, testing event CPA and QR redemptions.
